plot: Mira is a girl who dream of joining the astronomy club once she got into high school, after meeting a man and promising to discover new asteroids when she was younger. But the high school she got into had abolished its astronomy club the year before she enrolled, and it has now been combined with the earth sciences club. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Aruiteikō!" (Let's Go for a Walk!) by Nao Tōyama
